item.description:
A Night Of Illusion III
A Theatrical Performance Premiering Female Impersonators
$25./Person includes Italian Buffet Dinner & Show
Date: Saturday, October 18, 2008
Time: 6:30 p.m. - 11:30 p.m.
Place: Columbia Cultural Center
775 John Quincy Adams Blvd.
Taunton, MA 02780

Send the check to:
Community Counseling of Bristol County
One Washington Street
Taunton, MA 02780
Attn: Monica Antunes

The benefit is for CCBC HIV Consumer Advisory Board / Monica Antunes

P.S. The sponsor of this event is Ellen's agency
item.name: A Night of Illusion III
